conversation.message: Hello Parent_B. We are thrilled you appreciate our focus on creative play! Integrating structured learning with independent exploration is central to our philosophy. Our daily schedule ensures a robust balance: mornings typically begin with targeted, structured learning activities (like literacy or numeracy circles) designed to meet specific developmental milestones. Immediately following, we dedicate significant time to 'open-ended exploration' across various learning centers. During this time, children choose their activities, and teachers facilitate deeper engagement, turning play into meaningful learning opportunities. This flow ensures children benefit from direct instruction while building essential skills like autonomy and critical thinking through self-directed play.
